scripts.build: npx react-native bundle   --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./build/Chess.app
scripts.run: npx react-native bundle  --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./build/Chess.app && scp ./build/Chess.app root@192.168.1.21:/mnt/us/documents/Chess.app
